column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Suyin says : " I say we make our approach from the west , drop down from the airship on cables , ambush these Red Lotus low - lives before they know what hit them . "
#Text=Lin says : " It will never work .
#Text=" Lin says : " Yeah .
#Text=We come up from the valley , scale the side of the mountain and take them off guard .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " That could work .
#Text=" Suyin says : " And give them the high ground ?
#Text=No , if their lavabender spots us , he 'll melt the mountainside and us with it .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Wait , I 've got it .
#Text=I 'll disguise myself as a lost hiker , and once I 'm in the temple , I 'll distract the Red Lotus with my bird calls .
#Text=That 's when you all strike .
#Text=" Mako says : " Bird calls , really ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Well I have n't noticed you offering any suggestions .
#Text=" Korra says : " It does n't matter .
#Text=None of these ideas will work .
#Text=The second Zaheer realizes we 're up to something , he 'll wipe out the airbenders .
#Text=" Suyin says : " And Opal is one of those airbenders .
#Text=Believe me , I understand what 's at stake .
#Text=" Korra says : " Then I 'll think you agree that the only plan that will work is for me to give myself up .
#Text=" Mako says : " What ?
#Text=" Lin says : " Korra , no .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " We 'll figure out another way .
#Text=" Korra says : " I talked it over with Lord Zuko , and I 've given it a lot of thought .
#Text=I have to do this .
#Text=" Asami says : " You ca n't expect us to sit by and let Zaheer take you .
#Text=" Korra says : " The world has been out of balance for far too long : it needs the Air Nation back again .
#Text=I ca n't let Zaheer destroy it and everyone we love .
#Text=Help me save the airbenders , then you can worry about saving me .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " We 're with you , Korra .
#Text=" Suyin says : " Yes , whatever you need , they 're here .
#Text=" Korra says : " I 'll go radio Zaheer .
#Text=" Korra says : " Zaheer , are you there ?
#Text=It 's me .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " I 've been waiting for your call .
#Text=So , do we have a deal ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Yes .
#Text=You release the airbenders , and then I 'll turn myself over .
#Text=" Zaheer says : " And take away the only leverage I have ?
#Text=No .
#Text=I ca n't do that .
#Text=Listen carefully , here 's what I need you to do .
#Text="
